short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click download all images from page, easy to filter and select satisfactory image sequences and customisable download filenames.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Many people in the use of batch image download extension plug-ins, can not freely define the file name after download, which gives the later use of images and processing has brought difficulties, this plug-in has a self-defined download file name function, while using the image size filter can be easily filtered out the unwanted images, while providing a manual selection function, the do not want to download the images from the list out. The usage is as follows:
When the web page is loaded, click the icon of this extension, all the pictures will be shown in the popup window, drag and drop the size selector to filter the picture list, meanwhile click the picture to cancel or confirm whether some pictures need to be downloaded or not, fill in the name of the downloaded file in the custom picture file name control, if keep it empty, the picture will be downloaded with the current file name. If the file name is left empty, the picture will be downloaded with the current file name. Click the Download button and the selected picture will be downloaded to the default download folder. Because this is a batch image download, the downloaded image will be saved locally with a custom filename plus a serial number.
